snippet: Senate Democrats wrote to the president asking him to take any steps in the face of Republican opposition to avoid a default on the national debt.
abstract: Senate Democrats ask Pres Obama to take any lawful steps available to avoid a default on nation’s debt if Republicans continue to press their demand that increase in government’s borrowing limit be accompanied by spending cuts of same magnitude.
lead_paragraph: Senate Democrats wrote to the president asking him to take any steps in the face of Republican opposition to avoid a default on the national debt.

headline.seo: Democrats Urge Obama to Take ‘Any Lawful Steps’ to Avoid Default
headline.main: ‘Any Lawful Steps’ Urged to Avert Default
headline.print_headline: ‘Any Lawful Steps’ Urged to Avert Default
